en: Welcome to the nation of Spud. A land of [pulse freq=2][color=MEDIUM_VIOLET_RED]prosperity for all potatoes[/color][/pulse].
You've been selected for a [color=DARK_ORANGE]crucial role[/color] in protecting our borders.
BEHOLD! The [color=MEDIUM_VIOLET_RED]mighty wall[/color] that safeguards our nation. This is where you'll serve, ensuring only the worthy enter.
Ah, the new sprout. Listen carefully, your role is [color=DARK_ORANGE]vital to Spud's security[/color].
Your family's well-being [wave amp=20 freq=3][color=YELLOW]depends on your performance[/color][/wave].
I appoint you as a Customs Officer of [pulse freq=1][color=MEDIUM_VIOLET_RED]glorious Spud[/color][/pulse]. Any questions?
"I'm ready to serve Spud with all my starch!"
Excellent! That's the kind of enthusiasm we need. You might earn a [color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color] commendation.
They're... [color=DARK_VIOLET]processed[/color]. According to protocol. [color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color] handles all the details.
Your first shift begins now. Check papers carefully, deny those who don't meet our standards.
Meet your quota, avoid strikes. [color=MEDIUM_VIOLET_RED]Glory to Spud![/color]
